name: August's venture: escape from the fabled planet
name_original: August's venture: escape from the fabled planet
description:
Two Dudes Entertainment presents... 

August's Venture   Escape from the fabled planet

When the technology brought humans to travel through space, the great age of the space adventurers and discoverers started, and with it many legends began...

The most famous legend is that of Marvin Holmes, a great adventurer who hid his treasures on a secret planet.

Paula August, a young space adventurer who always believed in this legend, must make an emergency landing on what she believes to be the treasure planet.

Now she has to explore the unknown planet and find a way to leave it.

Are you ready to follow Paula in her journey and explore the misterious planet? 

Then download and enjoy the game!

Game description:

August's venture brings the player to an intense and exciting journey in a dangerous planet full of creatures and hidden secrets.  This game was developed as a hobby project in free time by two people.

  • Use your stealth skills and strategy to progress in the levels.
  • Explore the levels to find secret items and accesories.
  • Use the items wisely to avoid enemies or distract them.
  • Learning enemies behaviors will help you.
  • Finish the level and beat your own highscore .
  • Explore the world and find secrets.
  • Use all your skills to survive.

Game specifications:

  • Mode: Single Player 
  • Engine: Unity 
  • Platforms: Windows and Linux (macos on demand)
  • Genre: Adventure/Stealth 
  • Input: Keyboard & Mouse 
  • Developer/publisher: Two Dudes Entertainment
  • Setting: Sci Fi
  • Language: English
